topic: Real-time Object Detection for Retail Analytics
short_description: An AI-powered system that analyzes video feeds to track customer movement and product interaction, providing actionable insights for store layout optimization.
A machine learning model that automatically reads and categorizes incoming support tickets by urgency and topic, routing them to the correct department.

topic: Generative Adversarial Network for Synthetic Data
short_description: Developing a GAN to generate realistic synthetic datasets for training machine learning models, particularly in scenarios with limited real-world data.

topic: Autonomous Drone Navigation with Reinforcement Learning
short_description: Training an agent to navigate complex environments autonomously using deep reinforcement learning, enabling applications in logistics and surveillance.

topic: AI-Powered Predictive Maintenance for Industrial IoT
short_description: A system that uses sensor data from industrial machines to predict failures before they happen, reducing downtime and maintenance costs.
Analyzing news articles, social media, and financial reports in real-time to gauge market sentiment and predict stock price movements.
